info.name: nginx version detect
author: philippedelteil
info.description: Some nginx servers have the version on the response header. Useful when you need to find specific CVEs on your targets.

request:
GET /actuator/health HTTP/1.1
Host: api.dossierfacile.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 
Connection: close
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Content-Type: application/vnd.spring-boot.actuator.v3+json
Date: Tue, 12 Oct 2021 01:50:51 GMT
Expires: 0
Pragma: no-cache
Server: nginx/1.20.0
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: DENY
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block

{"status":"UP","components":{"db":{"status":"UP","details":{"database":"PostgreSQL","validationQuery":"isValid()"}},"ping":{"status":"UP"},"rabbit":{"status":"UP","details":{"version":"3.8.14"}},"random":{"status":"UP","details":{"chance":0.5064351077416219,"strategy":"thread-local"}}}}

request:
GET /actuator/health/ HTTP/1.1
Host: api.dossierfacile.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Origin: null
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 401 
Connection: close
Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: null
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Date: Tue, 12 Oct 2021 01:51:45 GMT
Expires: 0
Pragma: no-cache
Server: nginx/1.20.0
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Www-Authenticate: Bearer
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: DENY
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block
Content-Length: 0

info.name: HTTP Missing Security Headers
author: socketz
geeknik
g4l1t0
convisoappsec
kurohost
dawid-czarnecki
info.description: It searches for missing security headers, but obviously, could be so less generic and could be useless for Bug Bounty.

request:
GET /actuator/health HTTP/1.1
Host: api.dossierfacile.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200

Date: Tue, 12 Oct 2021 01:51:46 GMT
Expires: 0
Pragma: no-cache
Server: nginx/1.20.0
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: DENY
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block

{"status":"UP","components":{"db":{"status":"UP","details":{"database":"PostgreSQL","validationQuery":"isValid()"}},"ping":{"status":"UP"},"rabbit":{"status":"UP","details":{"version":"3.8.14"}},"random":{"status":"UP","details":{"chance":0.8950174804372965,"strategy":"thread-local"}}}}
